title: Hyspheria
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054014/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054014/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Hyspheria**

Term coined by [Si Daniels](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054014/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Si%20Daniels) to describe designer hysteria regarding logos featuring three dimensional [balls](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415054014/http:/typophile.com/wiki/balls), such as the AT&T and Xerox re-brands.
author: Si_Daniels
